sourcesContent:
import { Box, Typography, Button } from '@mui/material'

const Hero = () => (
  <Box
    id="home"
    sx={{
      height: '90vh',
      backgroundColor: '#C5B0CD',
      color: '#17313E',
      display: 'flex',
      flexDirection: 'column',
      justifyContent: 'center',
      alignItems: 'center',
      textAlign: 'center',
      padding: 4,
    }}
  >
    <Typography variant="h2" fontWeight="bold">Odyssey of Wisdom</Typography>
    <Typography variant="h6" mt={2} maxWidth={600}>
      Youth association connecting Greek youth with Erasmus+ opportunities for travel, learning, and cultural exchange across Europe.
    </Typography>
    <Button
      variant="contained"
      size="large"
      sx={{
        mt: 4,
        backgroundColor: '#415E72',
        color: 'white',
        '&:hover': { backgroundColor: '#17313E' },
      }}
      onClick={() => document.getElementById('about').scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' })}
    >
      Learn More
    </Button>
  </Box>
)

export default Hero
